channel.title: David Gurteen on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in David Gurteen on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Knowledge Caf√©
item.description: DG - David Gurteen DG Good morning. We're not only going to talk about Knowledge Cafe, we are actually going to run one and get some experience of what it is all about. But let me start by telling you the story of how I started to run Knowledge Cafes, because Knowledge Cafes have been around for quite a while, probably since back to the early 90's and have taken various sorts of forms and formats.
